org.corfudb.infrastructure

Interface IDataStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataStore

    public interface IDataStore
    Key Value data store abstraction that provides persistence for variables that need retain values across node restarts or need to be accessed by multiple modules/threads.

    The key value store is partitioned by prefix (namespace/table). All values being stored under a prefix should be of a single Type or Class T.

    Created by mdhawan on 7/27/16.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        <T> void put(Class<T> tclass,
             String prefix,
             String key,
             T value)
        Stores a value for a key under a prefix (namespace).
        Parameters:
        tclass - the class of the object being stored
        prefix - namespace
        key - key-value key to store into
        value - Immutable value (or a value that won't be changed)

      • get

        <T> T get(Class<T> tclass,
          String prefix,
          String key)
        Retrieves the value for a key under a prefix.
        Parameters:
        tclass - the class of the object being retrieved
        prefix - namespace
        key - key-value key to look up
        Returns:
        value stored under key

      • delete

        <T> void delete(Class<T> tclass,
                String prefix,
                String key)
        Deletes the value for a key under a prefix.
        Parameters:
        tclass - the class of the object being retrieved
        prefix - namespace
        key - key-value key to delete
